# Draft:Battle of Ahlat (1436)

Battle of Ahlat is a battle between the Ottoman Empire and the Qara Qoyunlu
| commander1        =  Åžehabeddin Pasha
}}
Battle
Karakoyunlu forces launched an offensive to capture Ahlat and establish dominance around Lake Van. Ottoman troops successfully defended the city and repelled the Karakoyunlu attack. Karakoyunlu commander Emir Davud was killed in the fighting. This victory strengthened the Ottomans' eastern border defenses.
